!Trader Sarien: Come, partner. I am glad you have returned safely from the rugged land. First, relax and catch your breath. As your sack is bulging, you must have gathered quite a few products. Let us take a look at the outcome of the hunt! As promised, I will pay you according to how many items you brought.
